long_description: Offering 2mm neoprene for a warm, comfortable fit, the O'Neill Reactor Spring Wetsuit for toddlers lets your little one play in the water just like the big kids. Stretchy 2mm neoprene offers a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. UPF rating of 50+ ensures your little paddler stays safe from the sun. Rear zipper secures fit, and protective internal flap shields tender skin from abrasion. Back zipper pull makes it easy for kids to get in and out. Includes small interior pocket. Hand wash the O'Neill Reactor Spring Wetsuit for toddlers in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Offering 2mm neoprene for a warm, comfortable fit, the O'Neill Reactor Spring Wetsuit for toddlers lets your little one play in the water just like the big kids.
